name: Food Pit FRENZY
description:
Do you prefer your food SLICED or DEAD?

In Food Pit FRENZY, you play the role of a reaper who was recently hired to manage the Food Pit. This is where many cheerful foods meet their demise, and your job is to collect as many souls as you can from them for Grimmy, your boss!

SLICE passing foods with your Scythe to SEPARATE them into their ingredients! You can then use them to create new foods like Tomato Soup, Grilled Cheese, Chocolate Cake, and Chicken Salad! The boss loves these foods, fulfill his order for a surplus of souls!

Collect as many souls as you can! After times up, you'll be ranked based on how good of a job you did. If you work hard enough, you may reach the S Rank!

Controls: Use your Mouse to click foods and drag them around your workstation.

Made by BruhBurger Games

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiX9B6X0KnI8KAk4gGqAG9w

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@bruhburgeryt?lang=en

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bruhburgeryt/

Made for GDevelop Game Jam #3!
